title: Ep - 97 - HEIDI MONTAG FROM THE HILLS
description:
Heidi Montag discusses how she was cast for The Hills on MTV, what happened behind the scenes with producers, her relationship today with former cast members including Kristin Cavallari, Audrina Patridge, and Lauren Conrad today, and her life now with husband Spencer Pratt and their son Gunnar. 


Seattle Seahawks punter Jon Ryan reviews Age Love Gap on Netflix, a show about the social backlash and challenges that come with intergenerational romance.


Jodie Hough from Welcome to RealiTV podcast reviews the season finale of Catfish on MTV. 


Reality Life with Kate Casey
